message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOGATTENDEE_XRV_EXISTS
message.locale: A participant "%1s" already exists for this contact log.

message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOGATTENDEE_FV_EMPTY
message.locale: At least one participant must be entered for the contact log.

message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOGATTENDEE_CASE_PARTICIPANT_FV_EMPTY
message.locale: At least one case participant must be specified as a contact participant.

message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOGATTENDEE_XFV_MORE_THAN_ONE_ATTENDEE
message.locale: Only one participant can be entered. Please search for a registered participant or enter details for an unregistered participant.

message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOGATTENDEE_FV_LAST_ATTENDEE
message.locale: Can not remove "%1s" from participant list as at least one case participant must be specified as a contact participant.

message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOGATTENDEE_CASE_NOT_ACTIVE
message.locale: A contact participant cannot be deleted when the status of the investigation is "%1s".

message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOGATTENDEE_IS_DUPLICATE
message.locale: A participant that has been marked as a duplicate cannot be added as a contact participant.

message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOGATTENDEE_XFV_USERNAME_CONCERNROLEID
message.locale: Both user and concern role can not be specified as the same contact participant.
